title: A Makeup Ban in Syria for Women in Government and Public Sector Stirs Outrage
summary_full: A provincial governor wants to prohibit women in government and public sector jobs from wearing makeup, stirring outrage and many, many memes.
summary_public: A provincial governor wants to prohibit women in government and public sector jobs from wearing makeup, stirring outrage and many, many memes.
